column6: Ant-Man has to pull off an impossible break-in, but he can't do it alone. Which means... he's gonna need a new gang! Er, of criminals. New gang of criminals. Probably should mention that part. This is all because of that stupid mysterious bad guy we can't tell you about. Man, that is annoying. Out with it already, right? Comics.
column8: | penciller (cover):Mark Brooks | artist:Ramon Rosanas | writer:Nick Spencer
